title: Find the Pieces
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>This one and this one.... Wrong ones nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>This one and this one are also wrong.... This is quite hard....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I wonder how many pieces are left in this jigsaw puzzle.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin doesn’t know, but probably around 100 pieces. Rin feels like we can get it down all at once if we can find a pair that we can connect nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>You’re right. If one pair connects, then we should be able to see how the others connect as well....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Then, Shioriko-chan, let’s do it like this! Let’s close our eyes and try picking two like a memory game!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>....With around 100 pieces left, will we be able to find it like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>We won’t know until we try nya! Alright, then.... this one and this one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>....Shioriko-chan, it fits nya! These roof of a house pieces connected nya!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eeeeh!? Really!!??<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
